languages.text: "Я снимаю все обвинения с главы астропатического хора и приказываю казнить сестру Джуд".
languages.translation_comment:
Стартует этюд VP_ChoirWin
Казним сестру, весы налево

Стартует этюд VP_ChoirWin
Казним сестру, весы налево

languages.text: "I hereby clear the Choirmaster of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."
languages.original_text: "Я снимаю все обвинения с главы астропатического хора и приказываю казнить сестру Джуд".

traits.locale_text: "I hereby clear the head of the Astropathic Choir of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."
"I hereby clear the head of the Astropathic Choir of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."
"I hereby clear the head of the Astropathic Choir of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."
"The Astropathic Choir has served the dynasty faithfully and will continue to do so. I clear the Choir's head of all accusations and order the Doleful Host to lift its siege."
"I hereby clear the Choirmaster of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."
"I hereby clear the Choirmaster of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."
"I hereby clear the head of the Astropathic Choir of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."
"I hereby clear the Choirmaster of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."

languages.text: "Ich spreche den Chormeister hiermit von allen Anklagepunkten frei und ordne die Hinrichtung von Schwester Juth an."
languages.original_text: "I hereby clear the Choirmaster of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."

traits.locale_text: "Ich spreche den Chormeister hiermit von allen Anklagepunkten frei und ordne die Hinrichtung von Schwester Juth an."
"Ich spreche das Oberhaupt des astropathischen Chors hiermit von allen Anklagepunkten frei und ordne die Hinrichtung von Schwester Juth an."

languages.text: « Je lave le maître de chœur de toutes les accusations portées contre lui et ordonne l'exécution de sœur Juth. »
languages.original_text: "I hereby clear the Choirmaster of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."

traits.locale_text: « Je lave le maître de chœur de toutes les accusations portées contre lui et ordonne l'exécution de sœur Juth. »
« Je lave le chœur astropathique de toutes les accusations portées contre lui et ordonne l'exécution de sœur Juth. »

languages.text: “我在此撤销针对唱诗大师的所有指控，我命令处决犹斯修女。”
languages.original_text: "I hereby clear the Choirmaster of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."

traits.locale_text: “我在此撤销针对唱诗大师的所有指控，我命令处决犹斯修女。”
“我在此撤销针对星语唱诗班唱诗大师的所有指控，我命令处决犹斯修女。”

languages.text: «El Maestro del Coro queda absuelto de todos los cargos. Ejecuten a la hermana Juth».
languages.original_text: "I hereby clear the Choirmaster of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."

traits.locale_text: «El Maestro del Coro queda absuelto de todos los cargos. Ejecuten a la hermana Juth».
«El Coro de Astrópatas queda absuelto de todos los cargos. Ejecuten a la hermana Juth».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}はここに、クワイアーマスターの容疑を晴らし、シスター・ジュスの処刑を命じる」
languages.original_text: "I hereby clear the Choirmaster of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}はここに、感応通信聖歌隊の隊長の容疑を晴らし、シスター・ジュスの処刑を命じる」
「{mf|俺|私}はここに、感応通信聖歌隊の隊長の容疑を晴らし、シスター・ジュスの処刑を命じる」

languages.text: "Koro Şefi'ni tüm suçlamalardan beraat ettiriyor ve Rahibe Juth'un idam edilmesini emrediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I hereby clear the Choirmaster of all charges, and order Sister Juth to be executed."

traits.locale_text: "Koro Şefi'ni tüm suçlamalardan beraat ettiriyor ve Rahibe Juth'un idam edilmesini emrediyorum."
"Astropatik Koro'nun başını tüm suçlamalardan beraat ettiriyor ve Rahibe Juth'un idam edilmesini emrediyorum."
